when people don t like my social media posts , it upsets me.

content.text: Hey! How's your day going?
I'm hanging in there! I'm a little tired but otherwise I'm doing well.
That's good to hear! I'm doing well too. I just got back from a trip to Europe.
Oh, that sounds amazing! Where did you go?
I went to Italy, France, and Spain. It was so much fun! I got to see a lot of beautiful places and try some delicious food.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Europe. I'm glad you had a great time!
Thanks! I hope you get to go there someday soon.
Me too! It's definitely on my bucket list.
What are some of your other interests?
I love to read, I play a lot of video games, and I love to go to concerts.
Oh, that's cool! I love to read too. I'm not much of a gamer, but I do enjoy going to concerts.
Have you been to any good concerts lately?
I went to a metal show for my birthday last month. It was a lot of fun!
Oh, that sounds awesome! I love metal! I went to a Slipknot concert a few months ago. It was amazing!
Slipknot is so good! I'm jealous!
They're one of my favorite bands.
Me too!
We should go to a concert together sometime!
That would be fun! I'm down.
Great! I'll let you know when I find a good show.
Sounds good
